channel.title: Need help with my MoparServer =(
channel.description:
Okay, I'm just gonna give you a little background of what i did so that if i did sumthing rong, i can be sure of it. Okay, 1st i downloaded RichScape v1. Then i extracted it to another folder called "Raid Skape" which is the name of my server. Next, i downloaded hamachi so i could logg on to my server. Finaly, i logged into my server using moparscape.
Okay, now that u no the background info, here's what i need help with. After i changed dialoge, items in shops, and then saved it. When i played on my server, the NPC's dialog stayed the same as befor. Even when you logg on it says "welcome to richscape" when i changed it to Raid Skape.
I also want to know how to change what a new player starts out with and where. Right now it's giving new accounts a bronze sword, wooden shield, 25 minds and airs, and 30k. It's also starting players out in lumbridge. I would like to give them different items when they start out, and i want them to start out in edge.
1 last thing that i need help with is that I don't know how to find co-ordinates on my private server, so that i can add npc's to certain areas.
Thanks for your time and help. =)

item.title: Need help with my MoparServer =(
item.dc:creator: @Bladex0x Bladex0x
item.description:
@Bladex0x wrote:

u just double click “compile server” or compile. It looks like a run.bat

Read full topic
